name: Residents ‘Help Build San Diego’ at County Open House
description: Dozens of residents turned out for a County open house Thursday asking them to Help Build San Diego.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Reading Time:  < 1 minuteDozens of residents turned out for a County open house Thursday asking them to Help Build San Diego.
The open house was designed to inform residents about upcoming County projects like parks, libraries, fire stations and roads. They had a chance to give their input and have a little fun at the same time.
If you missed the open house, you can still provide feedback on the County’s draft Capital and Public Works plans at the County’s Engage Hub.
